extends TextGeneration
    The story segment generator

      • atLocation

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> atLocation()
        Generate text using the atLocation assertion in database related to the selected noun (there’s a rule for selecting a noun)

        Example: The room has a chair. possible storySegment There is a chair in room.
        Returns:
        map having concept id as key, the generated story segment as value
